entry.data:
CLOUDY WITH A 20 PERCENT CHANCE OF SNOW SHOWERS
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE UPPER 20S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 30S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 20S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY AND NOT AS COOL
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 40S
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS AROUND 50
LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 30S
LOWS IN THE MID 20S

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
COLD WITH LOWS AROUND 10 ABOVE

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 20S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
COLD WITH LOWS AROUND 10 ABOVE

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 20S
